headline: Renewable energy investing: How to play solar & nuclear
summary: RBC Capital Markets analyst Chris Dendrinos sits down with Julie Hyman on Market Catalysts to discuss the best ways to invest in renewable energy as the space loses support under the Trump administration. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
